titles.title: A bill for the relief of the estate of Major Travis E. Kitchens.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 7/29/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the estate of a named individual a specified sum relating to Federal income taxes on basic and retired military pay.
